I would recommend "Aladdin" as it is a classic Disney movie that has stood the test of time. The story is about a young prince who is given a wish by a genie. The prince's wish is for a beautiful princess. The story follows the prince and his friends on their quest to find this princess and grant her wish.
I would also recommend "Witless Protection" as it is a comedy movie that has been praised for its humor and wit. The story is about a small-town sheriff who witnesses what he believes to be an attempted kidnapping. His effort to save the beautiful damsel in distress sets him down a wild path of comic mishap.
I would also recommend "Waiting" as it is a drama movie that has been praised for its emotional depth and strong performances by its cast. The story is about a small-town woman who finds herself living on the streets finding ways to survive each day. Even with the cards stacked against her, she stays true to the Christian values instilled by her loving mother.
Little did she know how a random act of kindness would change the course of her life forever. In one unexpected moment, Aladdin found himself face to face with the woman of his dreams. Too bad she was completely out of his league. Comedy and musical numbers ensue as their paths continue to cross.
